sentence.text: In addition to a negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated mutation in a patient with all core features of the congenital variant of negative regulation of gene expression, we identified a missense (p.Ser240Thr) in regulation of postsynapse organization in a patient who appeared to be seizure free.

Finally, exome sequencing enabled us to characterize a heterozygous de novo missense (p.Val408Ala) in potassium ion transmembrane transport encoding the potassium channel Kv 1.2 in a girl with infantile-onset seizures variant of negative regulation of gene expression.
Our study expands the genetic heterogeneity of negative regulation of gene expression and RTT-like phenotypes.
